text: Yetiya te'om madiyanara jalasaya palegai, tata te'om dekhibalai pale edala manuhe sihamtara jantuboraka pani khuraa'i ache arau sihamtara paraa alapa amtarata dujani naraiye sihamtara pasubilakaka agaci dharai raakhiche. Mucha'i ka’le, ‘ki haiche tomalokara’? Sihamte ka’le, ‘pasupalakabilake sihamtara pasubilaka lai amtarai noyoraa laike ami amara pasubilakaka pani pana karaaba noraarao, arau amara pitr ati brd'dha’
